ValidationRule.description: Date Client Load Received can not be blank, if Client Load is Complete
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( ISNULL( Date_Client_Load_Complete__c ) ) && ISNULL( Date_Client_Load_Received__c ) && (NOT( BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: **** Date Client Load Received can not be blank, if Client Load is Complete *****
